fieldData.title: Workplace adaptation in favour of people with disabilities including in response to the COVID-19 health emergency
fieldData.title_nationalLanguage: Adattamento posti di lavoro a favore di persone con disabilità anche in risposta alla emergenza sanitaria Covid-19
fieldData.calc_minorCategory: Protection of workers, adaptation of workplace
fieldData.descriptionBackgroundInfo: With a view to support the adaptation of workplaces for people with disabilities with a working capacity below 50%, the Regional Labour Agency issued a call for demands covering a number of workplace adaptation measures, including changes linked to the COVID-19 health emergency (Decision no. 786 of 15 may 2020).
fieldData.descriptionContentOfMeasure: The measure was introduced by the Emilia Romagna's Regional Employment Agency , which is responsible for regional employment policies. It covers workplace adaptation interventions aimed to preserve employment of people with disabilities implemented after 23 February 2020, if linked to the COVID-19 emergency. Requests can be submitted by private and public employers. Public employers can participate only for purchasing or adapting phone exchanges to allow the employment of blind workers. The total amount of resources available is €300,000. The measure is funded by the Regional Fund for the employment of workers with disabilities. The interventions should cover workers with disabilities reducing their working capacity below 50%.
fieldData.statusOfRegulation: New aspects included into existing measure
